Class DictReader

java.lang.Object
  DictReader

public class DictReader
extends java.lang.Object

Class DictReader offers functionality to load a dictionary from a file, and to save it back to a file. To use this class, create an instance of this class with the file name as a parameter. Then call 'getDictionary' to receive the dictionary object.

Version:
2006-10-24, modified by M.E. Caspersen 2007-04-24
Author:
M. Kolling

save

public void save(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dictionary)
Accept a new dictionary and save it under the same name. Use the new one as our dictionary from now on.
